snippet: Big banks face another round of U.S. charges. | Henry M. Paulson Jr. testifies that ‘punitive’ A.I.G. terms were necessary. | Investors cheer the breakup of HP. | Lawyers for Goldman and Libya’s sovereign fund clash in court.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: More Trouble for Big Banks
